turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a beverage from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place the order for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a skinny vanilla latte, size grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want the drink hot or iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular milk, please. Whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. so you want to order a grande skinny vanilla latte. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I pick that up at the Starbucks at 333 North Michigan Ave in Chicago, Illinois?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins. the receipt has been sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic, no that's all. Thank you so much.
